name: SPACE-NIP
description:
Did you ever think about what it is like to be a cat? Or what is it like to jump on the jelly in space? In this game, you can try both! 
Our cute, little game is about jumping on clouds and jelly in space as a cat. You can choose your favourite cat- Raspberry (the tricolour cat) or Snowflake (the white cat).

The game was made during Warsaw Game Jam PRO 2022 (in less than 36 hours).

To play our game you need two gamepads. 
Use A (on Xbox controller) to jump and a stick to control the position of your cat.

PSST! Try RT (right trigger) in the menu to see (hear) what will happen! ✨

Code/Unity - Patryk Mielczarek, Szymon Rzosiński

Art (characters, cutscenes, UI) - Karolina Margielewicz
Art (environment) - Kamila Chmielowiec 

Music/SFX - Justyna "Juice Tea" Kryścio
